ygData.subject: Re: A new bard...
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually at level 12 I preferred Banded armor because it s so much lighter than Bronze.  The only real upgrade is to try to get Barbed or other magical armor,
ygData.messageBody:
Actually at level 12 I preferred Banded armor because it's so much lighter
than Bronze. The only real upgrade is to try to get Barbed or other magical
armor, but at level 12 you'll have to suffer through several levels without
unless you're the god of trading. (or have a high level to... ungh... twink
with)
----- Original Message -----
From: Sigma111 <sigma7@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, February 23, 2000 3:56 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] A new bard...


> From: "Sigma111" <sigma7@...>
>
> Hello,
> I just subscribed to this list, but I was wondering if any of you
> could reccomend a 1h slash weapon for a level 12 bard?
>
> Also, I am in bronze armor now for the most part..and it seems a bit
> heavy. Whats the next step armor wise?
>
> thanks!
>
>
